meanings.sent1: The nextdoor house is painted blue.
meanings.sent2: I live nextdoor to the park.
meanings.sent3: The nextdoor cat always sneaks into our yard.
meanings.sent4: The nextdoor trees seem to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent5: The nextdoor neighbors have a friendly dog that barks happily.

meanings.definition: The person or place that is adjacent or nearby.
meanings.sent1: My nextdoor is a kind old lady.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store is my nextdoor.
meanings.sent3: I always borrow sugar from my nextdoor.
meanings.sent4: The library is like a wise nextdoor full of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: My nextdoor always waves hello when I pass by.
